languages.text:
All enemies in a 2-cell radius around the target point must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. Those who fail, even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, immediately gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} where they attack their allies.
Every time an enemy becomes the target of this Navigator power again during the same combat, they gain a stackable +20 bonus to Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against it.
languages.original_text:
Все существа в радиусе 2 клеток от выбранной точки должны пройти {g|Encyclopedia:Test}проверку{/g} Воли на {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}сопротивление{/g}. В случае провала цели, даже если они {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}, немедленно получают {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, в который они должны атаковать своих союзников.
Каждый раз, когда в течение боя к одному и тому же противнику снова применяется эта сила, он получает суммирующийся бонус +20 при прохождении проверок Воли на сопротивление этой силе.

traits.locale_text:
All enemies in a 1-cell radius around the target point must pass a Willpower resistance check. Those who fails, even if they are stunned or immobilised, immediately gains an extra turn to attack their allies.
Every time an enemy becomes the target of this Navigator power again during the same combat, they gain a stackable +20 bonus to Willpower resistance checks against it.

All enemies in a 1-cell radius around the target point must pass a Willpower resistance test. Those who fail, even if they are stunned or immobilised, immediately gain an extra turn where they attack their allies.
Every time an enemy becomes the target of this Navigator power again during the same combat, they gain a stackable +20 bonus to Willpower resistance tests against it.

All enemies in a 1-cell radius around the target point must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. Those who fail, even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, immediately gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} where they attack their allies.
Every time an enemy becomes the target of this Navigator power again during the same combat, they gain a stackable +20 bonus to Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against it.

All enemies in a 2-cell radius around the target point must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. Those who fail, even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, immediately gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} where they attack their allies.
Every time an enemy becomes the target of this Navigator power again during the same combat, they gain a stackable +20 bonus to Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against it.

В случае провала цели, даже если они {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}оглушены{/g} или {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}обездвижены{/g}, немедленно получают {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, в который они должны атаковать своих союзников.

traits.locale_text:
Все существа в радиусе 1 клетки от выбранной точки должны пройти проверку Воли на сопротивление. В случае провала цели, даже если они оглушены или обездвижены, немедленно получают {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, в который они должны атаковать своих союзников.
Каждый раз, когда в течение боя к одному и тому же противнику снова применяется эта сила, он получает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +20 при прохождении проверок Воли на сопротивление этой силе.

Все существа в радиусе 1 клетки от выбранной точки должны пройти проверку Воли на сопротивление. В случае провала цели, даже если они оглушены или обездвижены, немедленно получают {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}дополнительный ход{/g}, в который они должны атаковать своих союзников.
Каждый раз, когда в течение боя к одному и тому же противнику снова применяется эта сила, он получает суммирующийся {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}бонус{/g} +20 при прохождении проверок Воли на сопротивление этой силе.

languages.text:
目标点周围2格内所有敌人需要进行意志{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若检定失败，敌人会立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，用来攻击其他敌人，即便是处于{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态的敌人也会受到此效果影响。
若同一名敌人在同场战斗中多次受到这一效果的影响，后续的每次影响在进行检定时，该敌人都会额外获得+20意志{g|Encyclopedia:Test}抗性{/g}检定加值，此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text:
All enemies in a 2-cell radius around the target point must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. Those who fail, even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, immediately gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} where they attack their allies.
Every time an enemy becomes the target of this Navigator power again during the same combat, they gain a stackable +20 bonus to Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against it.

traits.locale_text:
目标点周围1格内所有敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若检定失败，敌人会立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，用来攻击其他敌人，即便是处于眩晕或定身状态的敌人也会受到此效果影响。
若同一名敌人在同场战斗中多次受到这一效果的影响，后续的每次影响在进行检定时，该敌人都会额外获得+20{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}意志抗性检定{/g}加成，此效果可叠加。

目标点周围2格内所有敌人需要进行{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抗性检定{/g}。若检定失败，敌人会立刻获得一个{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}额外回合{/g}，用来攻击其他敌人，即便是处于{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}眩晕{/g}或{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}定身{/g}状态的敌人也会受到此效果影响。
若同一名敌人在同场战斗中多次受到这一效果的影响，后续的每次影响在进行检定时，该敌人都会额外获得+20意志{g|Encyclopedia:Test}抗性{/g}检定{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}加值{/g}，此效果可叠加。

languages.text:
Todos los enemigos situados en un radio de 2 casillas alrededor del punto objetivo deben realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de Voluntad. Quienes la fallen, aunque estén {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}aturdidos{/g} o {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}inmovilizados{/g}, ganan inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} durante el cual atacarán a sus aliados.
Cada vez que un enemigo se convierta en objetivo de este poder de navegante otra vez durante el mismo combate, recibe una bonificación acumulable de +20 a las {g|Encyclopedia:Test}pruebas{/g} de fortaleza de Voluntad contra su efecto.
languages.original_text:
All enemies in a 2-cell radius around the target point must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. Those who fail, even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, immediately gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} where they attack their allies.
Every time an enemy becomes the target of this Navigator power again during the same combat, they gain a stackable +20 bonus to Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against it.

traits.locale_text:
Todos los enemigos situados en un radio de 1 casilla alrededor del punto objetivo deben realizar una {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}prueba de fortaleza{/g} de {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Voluntad{/g}. Quienes la fallen, aunque estén aturdidos o inmovilizados, ganan inmediatamente un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}turno extra{/g} durante el cual atacarán a sus aliados.
Cada vez que un enemigo se convierta en objetivo de este poder de navegante otra vez durante el mismo combate, recibe una {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonificación{/g} acumulable de +20 a las pruebas de fortaleza de Voluntad contra su efecto.

languages.text:
Alle Gegner in einem Radius von 1 Feld um den Zielpunkt müssen eine Willenskraft-{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen. Alle, die sie nicht bestehen, selbst wenn sie {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}betäubt{/g} oder {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}gelähmt{/g} sind, erhalten sofort ein {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Zusatzzug{/g}, in der sie ihre Verbündeten angreifen.
Jedes Mal, wenn ein Gegner während desselben Kampfes erneut zum Ziel dieser Navigatorkraft wird, erhält er einen aufaddierbaren Bonus von +20 auf Willenskraft-{g|Encyclopedia:Test}Widerstandsproben{/g} gegen diese Kraft.
languages.original_text:
All enemies in a 2-cell radius around the target point must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. Those who fail, even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, immediately gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} where they attack their allies.
Every time an enemy becomes the target of this Navigator power again during the same combat, they gain a stackable +20 bonus to Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against it.

traits.locale_text:
Alle Gegner in einem Radius von 1 Feld um den Zielpunkt müssen eine {g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}Willenskraft-{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}Widerstandsprobe{/g} bestehen. Alle, die sie nicht bestehen, selbst wenn sie betäubt oder bewegungsunfähig sind, erhalten sofort eine {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}Extra-Runde{/g}, in der sie ihre Verbündeten angreifen.
Jedes Mal, wenn ein Gegner während desselben Kampfes erneut zum Ziel dieser Navigatorkraft wird, erhält er einen aufaddierbaren {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}Bonus{/g} von +20 auf Willenskraft-Widerstandsproben gegen diese Kraft.

languages.text:
Tous les ennemis dans un rayon de 2 cases autour du point ciblé doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de Force mentale. Ceux qui échouent, même s'ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdis{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisés{/g}, obtiennent immédiatement un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} pendant lequel ils attaquent leurs alliés.
Chaque fois qu'un ennemi est à nouveau la cible de ce pouvoir de navigateur au cours du même combat, il obtient un bonus cumulable de +20 pour les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} de résistance de Force mentale qu'il doit passer.
languages.original_text:
All enemies in a 2-cell radius around the target point must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. Those who fail, even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, immediately gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} where they attack their allies.
Every time an enemy becomes the target of this Navigator power again during the same combat, they gain a stackable +20 bonus to Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against it.

traits.locale_text:
Tous les ennemis dans un rayon de 2 cases autour du point ciblé doivent réussir un {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}test de résistance{/g} de Force mentale. Ceux qui échouent, même s'ils sont {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}étourdis{/g} ou {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilisés{/g}, obtiennent immédiatement un {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}tour supplémentaire{/g} pendant lequel ils attaquent leurs alliés.
Chaque fois qu'un ennemi est à nouveau la cible de ce pouvoir de navigateur au cours du même combat, il obtient un bonus cumulable de +20 pour les {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} de résistance de Force mentale qu'il doit passer.

languages.text:
指定地点の周囲半径2セル以内のすべての敵は、WIL{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならない。失敗した場合、その敵が{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}であっても、即座に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を得て、彼らの味方に攻撃しなければならない。
敵が同じ戦闘中にこの航宙士の力のターゲットに再度なるたびに、そのWIL抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に+20のボーナス（スタック可）を得る。
languages.original_text:
All enemies in a 2-cell radius around the target point must pass a Willpower {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}resistance test{/g}. Those who fail, even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, immediately gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} where they attack their allies.
Every time an enemy becomes the target of this Navigator power again during the same combat, they gain a stackable +20 bonus to Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against it.

traits.locale_text:
指定地点の周囲半径2セル以内のすべての敵は、WIL{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならない。失敗した場合、その敵が{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}気絶状態{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}であっても、即座に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を得て、彼らの味方に攻撃しなければならない。
敵が同じ戦闘中にこの航宙士の力のターゲットに再度なるたびに、そのWIL抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に+20のボーナス（スタック可）を得る。

指定地点の周囲半径2セル以内のすべての敵は、{g|Encyclopedia:WarhammerWillpower}意志力{/g}{g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}抵抗判定{/g}を行わなければならない。失敗した場合、その敵が{g|Encyclopedia:Stun}スタン{/g}や{g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}移動不可{/g}であっても、即座に{g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}追加ターン{/g}を得て、それらの味方に攻撃しなければならない。
敵が同じ戦闘中にこの航宙士の力のターゲットに再度なるたびに、その意志力抵抗{g|Encyclopedia:Test}判定{/g}に+20の{g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}ボーナス{/g}（累積可）を得る。

languages.text:
Hedef noktasının etrafındaki 2 hücrelik yarıçap içinde bulunan tüm düşmanlar, İrade {g|Encyclopedia:ResistanceTest}direnç testinden{/g} geçmelidir. Aksi takdirde, {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}sersemlemiş{/g} veya {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}felç olmuş{/g} olsalar bile anında dost birimlerine saldırmak için birer {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}ek tur{/g} kazanırlar.
Bir düşman, aynı çatışma içinde bu Rotacı gücünün bir daha hedefi olduğunda ona karşı yapacağı İrade direnç {g|Encyclopedia:Test}testine{/g} karşı +20 bonus (üst üste birikebilir) kazanır.
languages.original_text:

Those who fail, even if they are {g|Encyclopedia:Stun}stunned{/g} or {g|Encyclopedia:ImmobilisedEffect}immobilised{/g}, immediately gain an {g|Encyclopedia:ExtraTurn}extra turn{/g} where they attack their allies.
Every time an enemy becomes the target of this Navigator power again during the same combat, they gain a stackable +20 bonus to Willpower resistance {g|Encyclopedia:Test}tests{/g} against it.
